Articles.Content:
So I'm coming into land on the Mun when the evil kraken attacks... I mean REALLY evil...

Lander goes POOF!.... just vanished... and then I look at the altitude lol. *CUE DRAMATIC MUSIC*
The whole ship just disappeared??? Did you go through a Mun Arch by any chance?
The altimeter...YOU JUST UNCOVERED A PORTAL TO HELL! You've doomed all the Kerbals!
You have no idea what you have started. This will be the end of all Kerbals.
Time to send in the Kerbal Marines.
*Prepares for the Kerbal Universe to collapse*

Seven years later, the tracking station will receive a signal from the lander... and it will be coming from Jool orbit. A crew of Kerbonauts will be sent to investigate, and it will all go downhill from there.
I'm going to sing the DOOM song now....

Seven years later, the tracking station will receive a signal from the lander... and it will be coming from Jool orbit. A crew of Kerbonauts will be sent to investigate, and it will all go downhill from there.

Is there any chance that the lander has been to Hell as well?

Seven years later, the tracking station will receive a signal from the lander... and it will be coming from Jool orbit. A crew of Kerbonauts will be sent to investigate, and it will all go downhill from there.

It's all fun and games until the lander reappears, and Jebediah is sitting in his command chair with his eyes poked out, trying to get you to join him...
Unless the UNIVERSAL Kraken (Deep Space Cuthlhu I think) came in with the Doom Destructor! It is destined to destroy ALL SHIPS!
This happens to me every once in a while
